dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 367 IH: Territorial Tax Parity and Clarification Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Plaskett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the source rules for personal property sales in possessions of the United States.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Territorial Tax Parity and Clarification Act.

section.header: Modification of source rules for personal property sales in possessions

subsection.text: Section 865(j)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by inserting , 932, after 931.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2023.
